name: TheCW Flash Demo
description:
Hey this is a little flash demo 

Be warned this is a very early beta and doesn't have too many features 

Changelog: 

added Character selection

Tweaked Trail colours and overall trail

1.4:

Changed trails to be much more accurate to the show

Added new Feature: Time remnant !BETA!

Changed phasing: Now hold c to enter phasing mode 

Changed Phasing SFX

Overall tweaks to speed and other things

Movement: 

Shift = Sprint

WASD = Forward back left and right

Scroll wheel = Speed without sprinting

Character Selection: 

Flash = U

Reverse Flash = I

Savitar = O

All = P

Current features: 

Phasing = C

Flash Time = E

Time Remnant = Q 

Remove Time Remnant = R

Please recommend and key maps on my discord

https://discord.gg/JHTCp4hxnM
